description: Brambly and herbal, this wine shows bright acidity underlying a full-bodied, incoherently ripe palate of tar, toffee and rich cola notes.
name: Hestan

description: The nose is a bit shy but eventually reveals underbrush, red berry and a toasted note.
name: Il Grappolo

description: This Cabernet Sauvignon-dominant blend boasts leather, tobacco leaf and black pepper flavors.
name: Ehret

description: Fans of stickies may find pleasure in this bottling, but it is tremendously sweet and oily.
name: EOS

description: Aromas of ripe (leaning almost overripe) apple, melon and orange peel are followed by medium-sweet fruit flavors. It needs more acid to stand it up.
name: Martinez & Martinez

description: Strong wood smoke and grilled meat aromas lead to equally assertive oak and dried herb flavors.
name: Ironstone

description: This medium-bodied wine has more earthy and floral flavors than straightforward fruit.
name: Leaping Horse

description: This wine is dry and substantial, emphasizing earthy, savory flavors over fruity ones.
name: Kitchen Sink

description: This is from a hillside estate vineyard and is entirely barrel fermented.
name: Kuleto Estate
